text: Leigh Francis (born 30 April 1973) is an English comedy performer best known for his portrayal of foreign celebrity-obsessed character Avid Merrion in Channel 4 comedy programme Bo' Selecta!, as well as Northern businessman Keith Lemon in Keith Lemon's Very Brilliant World Tour and Celebrity Juice. As Keith Lemon, he has also made many appearances on Big Brother's companion shows Big Brother's Little Brother and Big Brother's Big Mouth. == Filmography == * Keith Lemon: The Film (2012) == Other websites == * *Leigh Francis Official Website Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Leeds Category:Comedians from Yorkshire Category:English television actors
title: Leigh Francis
